about.title: About FAB619 - Engineering & Innovation
about.description: At FAB619, we blend engineering expertise with creative design to deliver cutting-edge solutions in electronics, robotics, and 3D printing. With a passion for innovation, our team works closely with clients to turn ideas into reality, from prototyping to full-scale production.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a comprehensive range of digital fabrication and custom machine design services. From concept to creation, our team of experts will help bring your ideas to life with precision and innovation.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.description: Explore our completed projects showcasing our expertise in digital fabrication, custom machine design, and innovative engineering solutions. Each project represents our commitment to precision, creativity, and technical excellence.
